claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is an excerpt from the full prescribing information for Flublok (Influenza Vaccine) 2024–2025 formula. Under the “INDICATIONS AND USAGE” heading, it clearly states: “Flublok is approved for use in persons 18 years of age and older.” This directly confirms that Flublok is approved for adults aged 18 and over, supporting the claim.
